contents.contents: Keep walking along the rue Saint Thibault. The next step in the rally will be the underground galleries and the H么tel-Dieu on your right.

It was founded by Thibaut II of Champagne in 1160 and is now used as a centre to welcome pilgrims who used to be sheltered in the lower room connected to the galleries. Today, it has a direct access to the street.

explanations.contents: It is 40 metres long and is divided into 3 parts which are linked to the underground galleries.
